name: Admin Console Release 25.12.0
description: The following release of the LoginRadius Admin Console brings you some improvements. See below for details on the notable changes that have been applied to the Admin Console.

IMPROVED.text: Extended fields have been added for the Federated SSO > OpenID Connect and OAuth2 flow under the Admin Console.
To enhance the support experience, any ticket categorized under 'Billing' or 'Account' will now directly involve the billing team alongside the creation of a support ticket.
